    1: """See https://github.com/numpy/numpy/pull/10676.
    2: 
    3: """
    4: import sys
    5: 
    6: import pytest
    7: 
    8: from . import util
    9: 
   10: 
   11: class TestQuotedCharacter(util.F2PyTest):
   12:     sources = [util.getpath("tests", "src", "quoted_character", "foo.f")]
   13: 
   14:     @pytest.mark.skipif(sys.platform == "win32",
   15:                         reason="Fails with MinGW64 Gfortran (Issue #9673)")
   16:     @pytest.mark.slow
   17:     def test_quoted_character(self):
   18:         assert self.module.foo() == (b"'", b'"', b";", b"!", b"(", b")")
